full_summary:
**E0224-240179 - Cleaning Services at Northwest Atlantic Fisheries Center, St. John's NL**
=====================================

**Tender Description (English)**
------------------------------

The Real Property Operations Unit (Atlantic) in St. John's, Newfoundland is seeking a contractor to provide cleaning services at the Northwest Atlantic Fisheries Center in St. John's, Newfoundland and Labrador. The contract duration will be for 2 years, from March 1, 2024 to February 28, 2026, with the option to extend for an additional year.

The contract involves cleaning services for the center, with a requirement for security. The successful bidder will be required to provide evidence of satisfactory performance and meet all the requirements stipulated in the solicitation documents. The bidding process will be conducted through an open bidding process.

**Tender Description (French)**
------------------------------

L'unité des opérations des biens immobiliers (Atlantique) de St. John’s, Terre-Neuve, souhaite engager un contractant pour fournir des services de nettoyage au Centre des Pêches de l’Atlantique Nord-Ouest à St. John’s, Terre-Neuve et Labrador. La durée du contrat sera de deux ans, du 1er mars 2024 au 28 février 2026, avec la possibilité de prolonger pour une année supplémentaire.

Le contrat comporte des services de nettoyage pour le centre, avec une exigence de sécurité. Le soumissionnaire accepté devra fournir des garanties de cet engagement. Le processus de soumission sera organisé à travers un appel d'offres ouvert.

**Contact Information**
---------------------

For additional information regarding the tender, please contact:

* Chantal Blanchard, Contracting Authority
* chantal.blanchard@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca

**Additional Resources**
------------------------

The full tender documents, including all specifications, requirements, and terms and conditions, are available for download on the following website:

* https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/18270097?extsite=MTgyNzAwOTdfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==

**Closing Date and Time**
-------------------------

Tenders must be submitted by January 18, 2024, at 14:00:00 local time. Any late submissions will not be accepted.
